main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) over Nantucket Island reported on January 21, 1961.
interesting points: Different witnesses reported seeing one object initially as red and white flashing light that later changed to a steady white light., Observers at multiple locations, including Brant Point and Sankaty Head, confirmed seeing the objects., Some reports noted an altitude of approximately 900 to 1000 feet., The objects reportedly moved from north to northeast and appeared stationary before climbing straight up., Witnesses described the shape of at least one object as spherical, larger than a normal star.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with red and white lights
witness description: Officers at Brant Point Coast Guard Life Boat Station and personnel from Sankaty Head Light Station
